title.native: 異世界でもふもふなでなでするためにがんばってます。
title.romaji: Isekai de Mofumofu Nadenade Suru Tame ni Ganbattemasu.

description:
Dead of overwork at age 27...

Midori barely had time to lament having to die that way when a god appeared before her and said, "You will reincarnate in another world and tell me whether you think humans deserve to continue existing there. In return, I will grant you a special power." Then Midori, hoping to relieve the exhaustion of the harsh life she'd lived, found herself asking... to cuddle cute, fluffy animals.

Thus Midori reincarnated in her new world as a young girl named Nefertima, with a power that causes her to be loved by all living things other than humans. That includes not only animals, but holy beasts like white tigers and dragons, and even monsters like goblins and frozen spiders! But there was also a cruel fate awaiting her...

Nefertima is determined to do her best to coexist with humans and all living creatures in her new life of petting and patting cute animals!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: Each episode streamed 1 week early on ABEMA. The original TV broadcast started on January 7th, 2024.
synonyms: at the Isekai Fluffy Paradise I'm trying to do my best

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Class Struggle
tags.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Environmental
tags.description: Concern with the state of the natural world and how humans interact with it.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

node.description:
[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

Houno Satoshi is a Japanese composer and arranger, affiliated with Sound Drive.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/s_hono)

A Japanese duo consisting of two female voice actors, [Haruki Iwata](https://anilist.co/staff/126658/Haruki-Iwata) and [Moeka Koizumi](https://anilist.co/staff/126657/Moeka-Koizumi), who appear in popular stage plays, anime and mobile games. harmoe is a new project that recreates the world of fairy tales on stage by way of easy-listening dance pop music for the whole world to enjoy. Their debut single, “Kimagure Ticktack”, was released in March 2021.

[Website](https://harmoe.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/harmoe_official)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/遠藤麻未)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [background artist](https://anilist.co/staff/201516/)._
_Note: Not to be confused with the art director [Youko Nagashima](https://anilist.co/staff/174093/)._
